title: Ticket #4123: IPv6 cleanup
description:
Collecting small details that need to be cleaned up for IPv6 support. 

$ condor_config_val -address 'bacon' collector_host
condor_config_val: invalid address bacon
Address must be of the form "<111.222.333.444:555>
   where 111.222.333.444 is the ip address and 555 is the port
   you wish to connect to (the punctuation is important).

May want to mention IPv6 form here
creator: adesmet
